analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs in Direct-Order
The Dyad on Associated with Equanimity

original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Nanaupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an unassociated-with-equanimity state as condition, a state associated with equanimity arises, a root-cause condition … three triplets.🔽With an unassociated-with-equanimity state as condition, a state associated with equanimity arises, a root-cause condition … three triplets.

original: Naupekkhāsahagatañca nanaupekkhāsahagatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam ca na na aupekkhā sahagatam ca dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an unassociated-with-equanimity and an unassociated-with-equanimity and an associated-with-equanimity state as condition, a state associated with equanimity arises, a root-cause condition … three triplets. (In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
translated: With a root-cause as condition, nine … With a prenascence as condition, six … With a repetition as condition, six … With a kamma as condition, nine … With an absence as condition, nine.
